text: Smarana karuna, yakhana allahâ€Œ apanake sbapne dekhiyechilena ye, tara sankhyaya kama [1]; yadi apanake dekhatena ye, tara sankhyaya besi tabe abasya'i tomara sahasa harate ebam yud'dha bisaye nijedera madhye birodha srsti karate. Kintu allahâ€Œ tomaderake bamciye diyechena. Abasya'i tini antare ya ache se sambandhe sabisese abagata
